title: Texas Ice facility shooting: two dead and one injured, and ‘anti-Ice’ shell casings found
summary: Three detainees were shot at an immigration facility in Dallas, with all victims reported to be inmates. The alleged shooter, who opened fire, subsequently took their own life. Authorities are investigating the incident further.

title: Port Vale v Arsenal, Huddersfield v Manchester City, and more: Carabao Cup – live
summary: Scott Murray will provide updates on the League Cup third round action happening on Wednesday. Stay tuned for the latest news and results from the matches. Get insights on team performances and standout moments from the games.

title: Nottinghamshire v Warwickshire, tributes paid to Dickie Bird, and more: county cricket – live
summary: Notts is aiming to secure the County Championship title against Surrey in the final round of the season. Updates on the match will be provided by Tanya Aldred. Day one presents crucial developments in this championship-deciding contest.

title: Real Betis v Nottingham Forest, Red Star Belgrade v Celtic: Europa League – live
summary: Rob Smyth will provide updates and the latest news from the initial round of Europa League matches. Fans can expect timely insights and highlights as the tournament unfolds. Stay tuned for all the key developments.

title: Morikawa urges ‘absolute chaos’ from US fans but Rose backs Europe to focus
summary: Fans attending the Ryder Cup will undergo airport-style checks due to President Trump's visit. Golfer Collin Morikawa expressed hope that the crowd will be enthusiastic. The security measures aim to ensure safety at the high-profile event.
